下载shc数据，然后传到sec@192.168.8.58
然后远程启动shc.sh将数据插入数据库


startTime:	2014-08-05
exportFlag:	0
endTime:	2014-08-05
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a8317730007
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a835ab60009
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a82ed5d0006
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a82cb790005
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a839dbb000b
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a837f12000a
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a82a38f0004
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a8273c20003
bondTypes:	402880e5438a816001438a833adf0008
bondTypes:	ff80808146c9b061014734543a50101f
bondTypes:	402880f0437b131f01437b1c606b0003
bondNames:	
bondCodes:	

bondNames=""&
bondCodes=""&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a8317730007&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a835ab60009&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a82ed5d0006&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a82cb790005&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a839dbb000b&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a837f12000a&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a82a38f0004&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a8273c20003&
bondTypes=402880e5438a816001438a833adf0008&
bondTypes=ff80808146c9b061014734543a50101f&
bondTypes=402880f0437b131f01437b1c606b0003&
startTime=2014-09-19&
endTime=2014-09-19
exportFlag="0"

oicapv是用来修改三个文件的日期，然后复制到目标目录，然后upload.
